H0.text: Who was elected Prime Minister of India in 2014. Narendra Modi

H1.text: Who was elected Prime Minister of India in 2014. Rahul Gandhi

H2.text: Who was elected Prime Minister of India in 2014. Arvind Kejriwal

H3.text: Who was elected Prime Minister of India in 2014. NaMonia

A4.text: Narendra Modi (born 17 September 1950) is an Indian politician who has served as the prime minister of India since 2014.

A5.text: He won in both constituencies, defeating Aam Aadmi Party leader Arvind Kejriwal in Varanasi by 371,784 votes and Madhusudan Mistry of the Congress in Vadodara by 570,128 votes.
